# Exercise 1

Install and load the following packages

**{tidyverse}** **{admiral}** **{dplyr}** **{tidyr}** **{admiral.test}**

```{r  eval=FALSE}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show solution"

#installing the packages
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "admiral", "dplyr", "tidyr"))

library(tidyverse)
library(admiral)
library(admiral.test)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```
